Performer:
Nozawa Kichinosuke (see also Takezawa Yasaburō) (野澤吉之助)

Alternate Name: Takezawa Yasaburō (竹澤弥三郎)

Dates: '1980/04-1983/02'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Shamisen Player:

February 1980: The Battle of Coxinga

April 1980: The Battle of Kawanakajima

April 1980: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

May 1980: The Dance of Sambaso

May 1980: The Stuttering Painter

July 1980: The Nunobiki Waterfall

September 1980: The Dumpling Peddlers

October 1980: The League of the 47 Ronin

December 1980: The Dances of the Four Seasons

January 1981: The Dance of Sambaso

February 1981: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

April 1981: A Chushingura's Subplot

May 1981: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

July 1981: The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway

September 1981: The Maple Viewing Party

November 1981: The Shiraishi Story

December 1981: The League of the 47 Ronin

January 1982: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

February 1982: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

March 1982: The Red-Hot Love of the Greengrocer's Daughter

March 1982: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

April 1982: The Teachings for Women

May 1982: The Color Prints of Kagamiyama

July 1982: The Summer Festival at Naniwa

September 1982: Oshun and Dembei

September 1982: The Nine-Tailed Fox

January 1983: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

February 1983: Gonza the Lancer
